rows.title: Reference â€” What does this symbol mean in PHP?

90:
<p><code>_</code> <strong><a href="http://php.net/function.gettext#refsect1-function.gettext-notes" rel="noreferrer">Alias for gettext()</a></strong>  </p>

<p>The underscore character '_' as in <code>_()</code> is an alias to the <a href="http://php.net/function.gettext" rel="noreferrer"><code>gettext()</code></a> function.</p>
